page.title: 15HOUSING IN EARLS COLNE
page.content: My house is 10 years old,nearly 11.It is built of brindle bricks and it is lined with breeze blocks,the roof is made of tiles which are the same as the ones on the garage . My house has had 3 extensions,1 to make the kitchen bigger,1 for the utility and 1 to make a living room and another bedroom. The house has 6 rooms downstairs they are 1 sitting room,1 dinning room,1 kitchen ,1 toilet ,1 utility room and 1 living room . The upstairs has 7 rooms ,4 bedrooms, 2 toilets and 1 study.The boiler is in the utility room and the Gas and Electricity meters are under the stairs .Every room exept the utility , the sitting room (which has a fireplace) and the study have radiators .My house is typical of the new houses being built in Earls Colne. {Alison Cole
